commit.message:
i386.md (sqrt_extend<mode>xf3_i387): Remove.

	* config/i386/i386.md (sqrt_extend<mode>xf3_i387): Remove.
	(sqrt<mode>2): Extend operand 1 to XFmode and generate sqrtxf3 insn.

From-SVN: r264243

files.patch:
@@ -1,3 +1,8 @@

+	* config/i386/i386.md (sqrt_extend<mode>xf3_i387): Remove.
+	(sqrt<mode>2): Extend operand 1 to XFmode and generate sqrtxf3 insn.
